## Interested in attending?

Please register by completing [this Google Form](https://forms.gle/y3DQ64zSxzG1VgdE7).
We will ask for confirmation at a later date.
Please note that space is limited.
Please don't sign-up if you you are uncertain about whether you will be able to attend.

## Pre-bootcamp survey

Whether or not you want to attend the bootcamp, you are welcome to complete this anonymous (and light-hearted) [survey](https://forms.gle/YyTNDDayMNRWibBy5).
We'll use the data drawn from it to show how one can use R and R Markdown to create reproducible data processing workflows and even full manuscripts.
